subcategory.name: Shopping Carts
subcategory.description: Ecommerce shopping cart examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS shopping cart components to provide customers with an overview of their selected items, including quantities, pricing, and the ability to update or remove products before checkout. These shopping cart components are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.

components.name: Two column with quantity dropdown
